data.title: On poetry : speech of acceptance upon the award of the Nobel prize for literature, delivered in Stockholm, December 10, 1960 / St.-John Perse ; translated by W. H. Auden.
data.meta_description: On poetry : speech of acceptance upon the award of the Nobel prize for literature, delivered in Stockholm, December 10, 1960 / St.-John Perse ; translated by W. H. Auden., Saint-John Perse, 1887-1975., New York : Bollingen Foundation, c1961., United States New York (State) New York., PML 151509
data.text:
Hours

The Morgan Library & Museum is open Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Saturday, and Sunday from 10:30 am to 5 pm, and Friday from 10:30 am to 7 pm.

Support the Morgan

The programs of the Morgan Library & Museum are made possible with public funds from the New York City Department of Cultural Affairs in partnership with the City Council, and by the New York State Council on the Arts with the support of the Office of the Governor and the New York State Legislature.
